text: David Duane "Dave" Freudenthal (born October 12, 1950 in Thermopolis, Wyoming) is an American politician. He was the 31st Governor of Wyoming. Freudenthal was re-elected to his second term on November 7, 2006, and announced on March 4, 2010, that he would not attempt to seek a third term as Governor of Wyoming. Freudenthal is married to Nancy D. Freudenthal who currently serves as a judge on the United States District Court for the District of Wyoming and they have four children: Donald, Hillary, Bret and Katie. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Wyoming Category:American economists Category:Scientists from Wyoming Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Dave Freudenthal
